name: Downtown Winter Garden
address: 104 S Lakeview Ave, Winter Garden, FL
description: Historic charm, unique shops, restaurants, and a thriving community center.

name: West Orange Trail
address: 501 Crown Point Cross Rd, Winter Garden, FL
description: A 22-mile long multi-use trail ideal for biking, jogging, and walking.

name: Winter Garden Farmers Market
address: 104 S Lakeview Ave, Winter Garden, FL
description: A vibrant market featuring local produce, crafts, and live music every Saturday.

name: Garden Theatre
address: 160 W Plant St, Winter Garden, FL
description: A historic theatre offering a variety of performances and films in a charming setting.

name: Plant Street Market
address: 426 W Plant St, Winter Garden, FL
description: A marketplace with local vendors, food stalls, and craft breweries.

name: Lake Apopka Wildlife Drive
description: A scenic drive through wetlands with opportunities for wildlife viewing.

name: Winter Garden Village at Fowler Groves
description: An outdoor shopping center with a variety of stores and restaurants.

name: Oakland Nature Preserve
description: A nature preserve with trails and educational programs focused on local ecology.
